context_of_use: This use case allows admins to create, update, and manage products within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Ensure products are available and pricing is accurate.
description: Enable admins to create products, update prices, and manage inventory levels.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and authorized to manage products.
postconditions: Products are created, prices are updated, and inventory levels are managed.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to perform product management tasks.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to create new products.
The system shall allow admins to update product prices.
The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the process for handling out-of-stock products.
main_flow: 1. Admin creates a new product → System saves the product and confirms creation.
2. Admin updates product prices → System updates the prices and confirms the change.
3. Admin manages inventory levels → System updates inventory and confirms the adjustment.
